index.title: Overview
index.description: Universal EVM is a smart contract platform with built-in interoperability features, enabling the development of universal apps.

gateway.title: Gateway
gateway.description: A single point of entry for interacting with universal apps

connector.title: Connector Contract
connector.description: Enables message passing and ZETA transfer to and from universal apps

gas.title: Gas Fees & Limits
gas.description: Learn about ZRC-20 withdraw fees, message passing fees

zeta.title: ZETA
zeta.description: ZETA is the native staking, gas and governance token of ZetaChain

zrc20.title: ZRC-20
zrc20.description: Native gas and supported ERC-20 tokens from connected chains are represented as ZRC-20 on ZetaChain

erc20.title: ERC-20
erc20.description: ZetaChain's universal EVM supports standard ERC-20 tokens

addresses.title: Account Addresses
addresses.description: Learn about types of account address, how to use and convert between them

throughput.title: Liquidity Throughput
throughput.description: Liquidity caps on tokens and rate limiting
